main.code:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """
    color the lines based on their length: longest is blue, medium is yellow, and smallest is red.
    """
    output_grid = input_grid.copy()
    longest_line = "find longest grey line"(input_grid)
    shortest_line = find_shortest_grey_line(input_grid)
    mid_line = find_mid_length_grey_line(input_grid)
    output_grid = "color select line"(output_grid, longest_line, blue)
    output_grid = "color select line"(output_grid, shortest_line, red)
    output_grid = "color select line"(output_grid, mid_line, yellow)
    return output_grid
